geographical_features: extensive landmass with oceans on both coasts; major rivers (Mississippi, Missouri); vast natural resources; varied climate from arctic to tropical
climate: diverse — from continental to subtropical and arid
economic_strengths: largest global economy; high-tech industry; energy production; finance; aerospace; biotechnology; defense; agricultural capacity; global innovation leadership
army_size: approx. 1.3 million active personnel plus large reserves, global force projection
digitalization_level: very high — global digital and tech leadership
political_economic_threats: political polarization; global supply chain risks; competition with China; economic inequality; pressure on critical infrastructure
military_threats: cyber operations by state actors, terrorism, strategic competition with China and Russia
development_milestones: global superpower since mid-20th century; leading technological and military capabilities; founding member of NATO and numerous international organizations
